title: APPLiA’s Digital Interview - Why CBAM is detrimental to European Competitiveness
author: Cbam
text: In the latest edition of APPLiA’s short digital interview series, Paolo Falcioni, APPLiA Director General, discusses how the EU’s proposed Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism risks enabling a depressive industrial strategy that jeopardises the European economy and environment.
